TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TranslateTransform extends System.Windows.Media.Transform

Docs.summary: Translates (moves) an object in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] x-y coordinate system.

remarks.format:
## Remarks TranslateTransform defines an axis-aligned translation along the x- and y- axes. The following illustration shows the transformation matrix for a translation by offset (*dx*, *dy*).
![Translate Matrix 100010dxdy1](~/add/media/translate-matrix.gif "Translate Matrix 100010dxdy1") Typical 3x3 matrix for 2-D translations
**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the TranslateTransform class provides several special features: TranslateTransform objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float64 offsetX, float64 offsetY) cil managed

Docs.param: The displacement in the direction of the x-axis.
The displacement in the direction of the y-axis.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the displacements in the direction of the x- and y- axes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable copy of this by making deep copies of its values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable deep copy of the current object. The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property of the cloned object returns even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property of the source is

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects. For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings, although they might no longer resolve. It does not copy animations or their current values.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable copy of this object by making deep copies of its values. This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable deep copy of the current object. The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property of the cloned object is even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property of the source is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects. For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Freezable CreateInstanceCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the distance to translate along the x-axis.
Docs.value: The distance to translate (move) an object along the x-axis. The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Negative values move an object to the left; positive values move an object to the right. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty XProperty

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the distance to translate (move) an object along the y-axis.
Docs.value: The distance to translate (move) an object along the y-axis. The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Negative values move an object up; positive values move an object down. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty YProperty
